name: Bomb Labyrinth
description: Bomb Labyrinth is a captivating arcade that will help you to test your memory (or intuition). Remember the locations of the mines and build a safe route to the marked cell.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 160 MB available space
